document_data.mainbody:
Stormscale was a unique set of enchanted chainmail designed in honor of the sahuagin Umberlants sometime before the late 14 century DR.
Stormscale was a set of chains made of a dark metal. It granted the wearer limited immunity to lightning and electricity and discharged a damaging spark of electricity on anyone landing a successful strike on the wearer, similar to the electric jolt spell.
The first wearer of Stormscale was the infamous Dread Pirate Admiral Bluenose who served Umberlee, the Bitch Queen. Admiral Bluenose parted with Stormscale sometime before the  when it was stored amongst Governor Blackeyes buried treasures near Spindrift Town on the Nelanther Isles off the Sword Coast.
